pathAssistantSteps.info:
The Case has been Assigned to an Agent.

Next the Agent can contact the end-User for more Information

or if it is a Known Issue provide a Resolution.

The Resolution can be

1) Answer to a Question

2) Workaround for a Known Issue

3) Solution to a Problem

A New Case means someone has a Question or just reported an Issue via Email or another Supported Channel

The Case now needs to be routed to the correct Queue (Group) or Agent.

The Case is Resolved, meaning a Resolution is Provided.

Once the End-User excepts the Answer or Solution, the Case will be Closed.

Case will automatically Close after 30 days if no response is received.
